Introducing PiPify: Your Picture-in-Picture Chrome Extension

PiPify is your gateway to seamless multitasking while enjoying online videos. Picture-in-Picture (PiP) mode lets you keep watching videos while you browse the web, enhancing your productivity and entertainment experience with floating video.

Keyboard shortcut:
        windows: Alt+P
        mac: Alt+P
        chromeos: Alt+P
        linux: Alt+P

Whether you're streaming movies, binge-watching series, or catching up on sports, PiPify ensures you never miss a moment. Install the Picture-in-Picture chrome extension and unlock the power of floating video across all your favorite streaming sites.

For YouTube enthusiasts, PiPify offers additional convenience with an in-player button located conveniently next to the settings. This button seamlessly opens YouTube videos in PiP mode, allowing you to enjoy content in a floating window that remains visible even as you switch tabs.

Experience ultimate control with PiPify's floating window, equipped with play and pause buttons for effortless playback management. Exiting PiP mode is just as simple, giving you the freedom to toggle between full-screen and floating views at your convenience.

But what exactly is Picture-in-Picture mode? It's a versatile feature that empowers you to play videos in a popped-out, always-on-top player, allowing you to continue watching while you navigate other windows. PiPify lets you reposition the floating player along the screen border, ensuring it stays within view as you surf the internet.

Here's how PiPify works:
Find your desired video and start playback.
Click the PiPify extension icon to activate PiP mode for YouTube and other supported sites.
Select "Floating Picture in Picture" and enjoy uninterrupted viewing while you explore the web.
A floating video enhances your browsing experience by keeping the video in view as you scroll through webpages, ensuring you never miss a moment of your favorite content.

With PiPify, accessing the floating player and video controls is as easy as clicking an icon. Whether you're on YouTube or any other website featuring video content, PiPify ensures your viewing experience remains seamless across all browser tabs.

Experience the convenience and versatility of PiPify - your ultimate companion for immersive multitasking and uninterrupted entertainment.

Why Install PiPify?

Enhanced Multitasking: PiPify enables users to watch videos while simultaneously browsing the web or working on other tasks. This enhances productivity by eliminating the need to switch between tabs or windows, allowing users to seamlessly multitask without interrupting their video playback.

Seamless Integration: PiPify seamlessly integrates with all websites featuring HTML video elements, ensuring that users can enjoy Picture-in-Picture (PiP) mode across their favorite streaming platforms and websites. This versatility makes PiPify a must-have tool for anyone who consumes online video content regularly.

Convenience on YouTube: For YouTube users, PiPify offers added convenience with an in-player button for quick activation of PiP mode. This feature allows users to enjoy YouTube videos in a floating window that remains visible even as they navigate to other tabs or windows, providing uninterrupted viewing pleasure.

Customizable Viewing Experience: PiPify provides users with control over their viewing experience, allowing them to play, pause, and exit PiP mode with ease. The floating window can be repositioned along the screen border, giving users the flexibility to customize their viewing setup according to their preferences.

Improved Browsing Experience: By keeping the video player in view as users scroll through webpages, PiPify enhances the browsing experience, ensuring that users never miss a moment of their favorite content. This feature is especially beneficial for users who enjoy watching tutorials, lectures, or music videos while browsing online.

Accessibility Across Devices: PiPify works seamlessly across all platforms, allowing users to enjoy PiP mode on desktops, laptops, and other devices. Whether you're using Chrome on a PC, Mac, or Chromebook, PiPify ensures a consistent and immersive viewing experience.

In summary, PiPify offers users enhanced multitasking capabilities, seamless integration with popular streaming platforms like YouTube, customizable viewing options, and an improved browsing experience. With its versatility and convenience, PiPify is the ultimate tool for anyone looking to optimize their online video consumption and productivity.
